title: Make Unstoppable Simple: Creative Problem Solving in Life and Leadership
description: FAQ's about Make Unstoppable Simple: 1. Who is this book for? Aspiring professionals who want to accomplish more. 2. How is this book different? A hybrid memoir of personal and professional stories, tips and the ''Unstoppable'' system to move boldly towards your goals. 3. Why did Dina B. Simon, the author, write this book? To inspire others. To share her stories, insights and successes with others about how to move forward quickly. 4. Why does this book matter? People want to accomplish more in their life and the unstoppable framework is an easily applicable 4-step process that allows you to gain clarity, surround yourself with others and move quickly.
author: Dina B. Simon
